doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Elliptic by Julie Dillon

main.div:
Skip to content
Issue 87 – December 2013
Cover Art
Elliptic
Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award.

div.p: ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
